project_abstract.cdata: The Second Shaanxi Provincial Highway Project has the following objectives: 1) to support continuing development of road infrastructure to relieve congestion, to improve access to important archeological and tourist sites, to facilitate mobility and to increase the efficiency of road transport in the interest of stimulating economic activity by supporting a slice of the Shaanxi highway investment program during the ninth five-year plan; 2) to assist in the implementation of policies to alleviate poverty in the poor areas of the province; 3) to promote development of institutional capabilities of the Shaanxi Provincial Transport Department, through training and other means, in planning, design, operations and maintenance of Shaanxi's highway network; and 4) to increase the safety of road transport. The components of the project are as follows: 1) construction of five high-grade highways; 2) upgrading of the Xian-Sanyuan class I highway; 3) construction, rehabilitation and upgrading of three linking roads; 4) improvement and new road construction for poverty alleviation in poor counties in Shaanxi; 5) provision of equipment for high-grade highways, maintenance of roads and institutional strengthening; 6) road safety program; and 7) institutional strengthening and training.

P003652.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第二陕西公路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标包括：（1）协助陕西省实施公路投资“九五”计划，支持道路基础设施建设,缓解交通拥堵状况，改善通往重要考古地和旅游景点的交通条件，为人员货物流动提供便利，提高道路交通效率，进而刺激经济活动；（2）协助在陕西省贫困地区实施扶贫政策；（3）通过陕西省公路网规划、设计、运行养护方面的培训和其它措施，促进提升陕西省交通厅的机构能力；（4） 提升道路交通安全水平。本项目设有以下内容：（1）新建五条高等级公路；（2）升级西安至三原一级公路；（3）新建和升级改造三条连接道；（4）改造及新建公路，为陕西省贫困县开展扶贫提供支持；（5）为高等级公路、道路养护和机构加强活动提供设备；（6）公路安全；（7）机构加强和培训。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
